means: [地名] [法国、圭亚那、海地、毛里求斯、塞舌尔] 普莱桑斯

auth_sentence.content: In the Paris suburb of Neuilly Plaisance, Eric Manfredi, who teaches public law, cast his vote for the Greens Party.
